alert.note: Alert for Coastal Rockingham (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued July 12 at 3:34PM EDT until July 13 at 1:00AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...High astronomical tides will continue through the first half of the weekend. This will result in water levels nearing minor flood stage surrounding the time of high tide. * WHERE...In New Hampshire, Coastal Rockingham County. In Maine, Coastal York, Coastal Cumberland, Sagadahoc, Lincoln, Knox and Coastal Waldo Counties. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 1 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Hampton Harbor NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.0 ft, Moderate 12.0 ft, Major 13.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 12/11 PM 10.5 1.0 0.2 3 None 13/12 PM 8.8 -0.7 0.2 2 None 14/12 AM 10.6 1.1 0.1 2 None 14/12 PM 9.0 -0.5 0.1 2 None 15/01 AM 10.8 1.3 0.2 2 None Seavey Island / Portsmouth NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.5 ft, Moderate 12.5 ft, Major 13.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.7 ft, Moderate 3.7 ft, Major 4.7 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 12/11 PM 10.2 1.4 0.2 3 None 13/12 PM 8.6 -0.2 0.2 2 None 14/12 AM 10.3 1.5 0.1 2 None 14/01 PM 8.8 -0.0 0.2 2 None 15/01 AM 10.5 1.7 0.2 2 None Portland ME MLLW Categories - Minor 12.0 ft, Moderate 13.0 ft, Major 14.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.3 ft, Moderate 3.3 ft, Major 4.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 12/10 PM 11.7 2.0 0.3 4 None 13/11 AM 9.5 -0.2 0.0 3-4 None 13/11 PM 11.6 1.9 0.0 2 None 14/12 PM 10.0 0.3 0.2 2 None 15/12 AM 11.9 2.2 0.2 2 None Boothbay Harbor ME MLLW Categories - Minor 13.0 ft, Moderate 14.0 ft, Major 15.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 3.3 ft, Moderate 4.3 ft, Major 5.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 12/10 PM 11.4 1.7 0.4 4 None 13/11 AM 9.3 -0.4 0.1 3 None 13/11 PM 11.2 1.5 0.0 2 None 14/12 PM 9.7 -0.0 0.2 1-2 None 15/12 AM 11.5 1.8 0.2 1-2 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
